CoffeeScript code¶

glrimon.coffee¶

useful to automatically convert glrimon.coffee to glrimon.js everytime glrimon.coffee is changed:

/usr/bin/coffee -cw glrimon.coffee &

Global variables¶

map¶

A global map object

window.selected_sites, window.highlighted_sites, window.theme_name¶

some page level data bound to the window object

protocol¶

For conveniently switching between “http” and “https”

Methods¶

main()¶

Not really a function called main, just the main Dojo require() call which wraps everything else.

querySites(event)¶

query server for sites near mouseclick

param event:the triggering mouse click event
set_legend(which)¶
param string which:
 which legend, key for renderers

Forces update of map to show new legend

renderers¶

A mapping to site point renderers by name, “global” data within the require() call.
